# üëã Hi there, I'm Christopher
A Software Engineer in the Games industry.

*"It is not enough for code to work."* - Robert C.Martin. 
I'm an advocate for clean code, a huge proponent for the use of entity-component systems, as well as the use of good software engineering practices such as object-oriented programming, automated testing and behaviour-driven development.

### üéÆ &nbsp;About Me
   üíï &nbsp; I love video games, constantly aiming to be competitive in any I play.\
   üéì&nbsp; Graduated with a 1st class honours in Computer Science (Software Engineering) at Royal Holloway, University of London.\
   üíª&nbsp; Interested in creating compelling and fun games using either Unreal Engine, using my knowledge of C++ and Blueprints.\
   üõ†Ô∏è&nbsp; Extensive experience using both luau and roblox-ts (a typescript to lua compiler) to create multiplayer experiences.\
   üéπ&nbsp; In my free time, I enjoy playing games and learning the Piano.\
   üìß&nbsp; Any other questions? Feel free to shoot me an email. I'll respond as quick as I can!
